verses.text: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* love \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 116:1 \ft LORD or GOD in all caps is from the Hebrew יהוה Yahweh except when otherwise noted as being from the short form יה Yah.\f* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w listens|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w cries|strong="H6963"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4672"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* surrounded \w me|strong="H4672"\w*, \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w pains|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*\f + \fr 116:3 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* got \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H4672"\w* \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w me|strong="H4672"\w*. \w I|strong="H6869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* \w and|strong="H6869"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7121"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: “\w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* beg \w you|strong="H5315"\w*, \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*. Yes, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w merciful|strong="H2587"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w preserves|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H1809"\w* \w low|strong="H1809"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w dealt|strong="H1580"\w* \w bountifully|strong="H1580"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w falling|strong="H1762"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* believed, \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3966"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w*.”
\w I|strong="H3605"\w* said \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w haste|strong="H2648"\w*, “\w All|strong="H3605"\w* people are \w liars|strong="H3576"\w*.”

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w benefits|strong="H8408"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, yes, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*.

\w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w truly|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* girl. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* freed \w me|strong="H5650"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w chains|strong="H4147"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, yes, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,

\w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H8432"\w*, \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!\f + \fr 116:19 \ft Hebrew: יה Yah\f*
